knimeNode.name: RDKit Add Hs
knimeNode.shortDescription: Adds hydrogens to an RDKit molecule.

fullDescription.intro: Adds hydrogens to an RDKit molecule.
fullDescription.option: The input column with RDKit Molecules.
The name of the new column, which will contain the calculation results.
Set to true to remove the specified source column from the result table.

outPort.name: Output table with RDKit Molecules with added Hs

ports.outPort: Output table with RDKit Molecules with added Hs
